@r34p4g3pk wrote:

If your using a delta source use this

} if (command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights > 0){ sM("AbsX: "+absX+" AbsY: "+absY+"");

Change the command to coords if you like, but if your using basic silab, theres no need the coords are listed in your tools/teleport tabs.

P.S. I have just started coding and I think this would be getting on the right track?

     }
    if (command.startsWith("cords") && playerRights >= 0) {
        	String[] args = command.split(" ");
        	if(args.length == 3) {
                int givePosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
                int GivePosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
    }

Im not sure if that code would work or not becuase I am a nooooooob coder, and that is the aboslute FIRST code I have made, lol and it looks rong, rofl.
